abstract: Barnes & Noble reports fourth quarter net loss of $19.4 million, or 37 cents per share; reports revenue of $1.18 billion, down 10.4 percent from year-earlier period; represents fourth consecutive quarter of declining sales.
lead_paragraph: To return to growth, Barnes & Noble has been prominently featuring popular books and movies, organizing group reading activities and integrating its online and retail platforms.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble’s Sales Decline Both Online and in Bookstores
headline.print_headline: Barnes & Noble’s Sales Decline Both Online and in Bookstores

snippet: To return to growth, Barnes & Noble has been prominently featuring popular books and movies, organizing group reading activities and integrating its online and retail platforms.
